citations.narrative:
In the enclosure housing Noah, Nala #2 and Kara there were areas of broken chicken wire lining the left side of the
enclosures wall. The ends of the wires were sticking out and away from the wall which could potentially harm the cats.
The outdoor enclosure housing the animals shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury. Correct
by November 30, 2021.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
In the enclosure housing Noah, Nala #2 and Kara there were areas of broken chicken wire lining the left side of the 
enclosures wall. The ends of the wires were sticking out and away from the wall which could potentially harm the cats. 
The outdoor enclosure housing the animals shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury. Correct 
by November 30, 2021. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
